name: Codename Allnight
description:
Welcome to the Neo-Colonies! This vast, almost never ending society is plagued with dangerous never before seen species, and hostile factions, created as a result of the twisted history that gave life to what should be present day America. The primary goal is to survive by any means. Also, you are apart of a faction called, Historians tasked with uncovering the truth. Which, may be a harder than it seems no one from the those days are alive anymore the only traces of the story and other people's accounts are letters and historical documents.

Game Features:

  • Random Generation
  • Story-driven Setting
  • Progressive Shooter
  • Crafting System
  • Leveling System
  • Base Building

 In the Neo-Colonies the choice is yours, will you uncover the truth or establish a base, build your character up, and take the ultimate survival challenge.
